pages.text: $(o)"You hear her? In the Wood, the Goat awaits. The Wood was born out of the Goat, who bred it, with all love and devotion such a god can muster, so basically none. In the Wood, you may find the letter of a loved one, or a feast set up ready... or you might find a dead Lamb."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with $(l:lessons/lesson_collection)Essence of the Wood$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this deity will increase the growth of all plants nearby.
